_header: I pray you sirs both more and less
_description: Introduction to a series of Christmas carols — one couplet

BodDou302.Transcription:
I pray ȝow syrus boothe moore & lassyng þese caroles in
                    cristemas
BodDou302.Editions:
Chambers,  Edmund Kerchever,  and  Frank Sidgwick.  
             “Fifteenth Century Carols by John Audelay.” 
             Modern Language Review
         5 (1910): 473-91: 479.
